game_notes.Note 2: ISK is both in-game currency and real-world currency of Iceland where the game was developed.

game_currency.Silver Quarter: Second biggest Unit.  1/4 of a dollar.

game_ach.Com L1 Normal: Completed Level One on Normal Difficulty

game_ach.Com L1 Quick: Completed Level One Normal Difficulty in less than 2 minutes

game_ach.Com L2 Hard: Completed Level Two on Hard Difficulty
